title: SAP Basis Expert
description:
**SAP Basis Expert**



Are you passionate about ERP systems, especially SAP—and eager to shape both strategic and technical solutions in a fast-paced, evolving environment? At Epiroc, we’re expanding our SAP team and looking for a talented SAP Basis professional to help us drive innovation and deliver long-lasting, scalable solutions.

  


**Your Mission**

As a key member of our SAP team, you’ll play a central role in aligning SAP’s strategic direction with operational excellence. You’ll collaborate across departments to design and implement both high-level strategies and hands-on technical solutions, ensuring our ERP landscape remains robust, flexible, and future-ready.  



Our SAP environment supports around 20 customer centers and 2 production companies. We’ve already embarked on an exciting journey to upgrade to SAP S/4HANA—now’s your chance to be part of it.

  


**Your Role**

Ensure a stable and secure SAP environment through proactive monitoring, troubleshooting, and performance tuning.

Manage system upgrades, patch implementations, and system refreshes.



Support and coordinate change requests and release management.



Oversee SAP roles and authorizations in both SAP ERP and Fiori.



Administer SAP Cloud ALM, SAP BTP, and Fiori applications.



Promote standardization across all SAP-using entities within Epiroc.



Demonstrate a solid understanding of the RISE with SAP concept, particularly in the context of implementation and service request administration.

  


**Your Profile**

Proven experience in SAP Basis or technical SAP administration.

Strong knowledge of ECC and S/4HANA system configuration and management.



A proactive, analytical mindset with a passion for solving complex problems.



Excellent communication skills and the ability to work with diverse stakeholders.



A collaborative spirit and a drive to contribute to long-term ERP strategy.

  


**Location and other**

We’re ideally looking for candidates based at one of our Epiroc IT hubs: Örebro or Stockholm in Sweden, or Prague in the Czech Republic.  



If you’re based in another country and successfully apply, please note that local terms and conditions will apply.  


**Why Epiroc?**

By joining our team, you’ll make a big difference in the energy transition. At Epiroc, we take pride in being passionate innovators, driving the change toward a brighter future for both people and the planet. Guided by our values of Collaboration, Commitment, and Innovation, we foster a culture of trust, growth, and lasting impact.  



To support your journey, we offer a competitive Total Rewards Package, including:  


* Global career opportunities


* Learning & Development programs


* Benefits package, including variable compensation (bonus)


* Flexible work culture promoting balance and well-being


* Global Parental Leave Policy


* Community involvement

  


**Application and contact information**

We encourage you to submit your application through our online career site as soon as possible, but no later than 2025-06-26. We review applications on a rolling basis. Please note that, due to the current regulations, we will only consider applications received through our system and not via email or social media.  



We are committed to a thorough recruitment process, including interviews, reference checks and assessments. To ensure a safe working environment, we conduct identity checks and drug and alcohol screening. Our process is designed to be fair and inclusive; you can expect transparent communication and a balanced evaluation of your skills and experience.  



For questions about the position, please contact hiring Manager, Ulrika Larsson, Manager IT ERP Solutions, ulrika.larsson@epiroc.com  



For questions about the hiring process, please contact Dana Galova, Recruitment Specialist dana.galova@epiroc.com.  


We have already made our choices regarding advertising channels and consulting providers, and kindly request not to be contacted regarding such inquiries  


**A hybrid workplace**Life at Epiroc can include the possibility for a hybrid workplace. It is a way of working that offers flexibility and participation allowing for a better balance between work and private life, which also promotes well-being. The hybrid workplace is an opportunity if work allows, based on your role, responsibilities, and individual conditions.  

**Epiroc** is a global productivity partner for mining and construction customers, and accelerates the transformation toward a sustainable society. With ground-breaking technology, Epiroc develops and provides innovative and safe equipment, such as drill rigs, rock excavation and construction equipment and tools for surface and underground applications. The company also offers world-class service and other aftermarket support as well as solutions for automation, digitalization and electrification. Epiroc is based in Stockholm, Sweden, had revenues of more than SEK 60 billion in 2023, and has around 18 200 passionate employees supporting and collaborating with customers in around 150 countries. Learn more at www.epirocgroup.com.

title: Microsoft 365 Specialist
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
**Vi söker seniora Microsoft 365-specialister som vill skapa moderna, effektiva arbetsplatser för framtiden!**
 Har du minst fem års erfarenhet som specialist inom Microsoft 365 och vill ta nästa steg i en miljö där din kompetens verkligen gör skillnad? Nu söker vi fler seniora kollegor till vårt Modern Workplace-team som vill vara med och forma nästa generations digitala arbetsmiljöer tillsammans med oss på Sopra Steria.
   

  

**Mer om rollen**
 Som Microsoft 365-specialist hos oss arbetar du med att designa, utveckla och implementera strategiska lösningar baserade på Microsoft 365 och relaterade teknologier. Du blir en del av ett kunnigt, inkluderande och engagerat team som drivs av samarbete, nyfikenhet och viljan att skapa verklig nytta för våra kunder.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö med spännande uppdrag där din erfarenhet, dina idéer och din tekniska höjd blir viktiga för att ta våra leveranser till nästa nivå.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som:**
* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet som specialist inom Microsoft 365 – du är trygg i din kompetens och van att guida kunder.
* Har arbetat med .NET, SharePoint, Microsoft 365, Power Platform och gärna även Azure.
* Har erfarenhet av Microsoft SQL Server och Microsoft Graph API.
* Är van vid att arbeta i både svenska och internationella miljöer – du behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift.
* Har ett starkt konsultmässigt mindset – du är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och gillar att jobba nära kund.


 Det är meriterande om du tidigare arbetat i konsultroll och/eller har erfarenhet av arkitektur eller utveckling inom SharePoint eller Power Platform.
   

  

**Varför välja Sopra Steria?**
 Hos oss får du:
   

  

* Möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken inom Microsofts ekosystem.
* Spännande uppdrag hos några av Sveriges mest intressanta organisationer.
* En kultur som bygger på Power of Sharing – vi lär oss av varandra, stöttar varandra och utvecklas tillsammans.
* Trygga villkor, förmåner och en arbetsmiljö där kompetens, balans och gemenskap står i centrum.


**Ansök nu – vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!**
 Vi behandlar ansökningar och kallar till intervju löpande. På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

 Rekryteringsprocessen består av tre intervjuer, ett logiskt test, referenstagning och bakgrundskontroll. Denna kombination av urvalsmetoder ger oss en bredare och mer rättvis bild av dig som kandidat, samtidigt som det säkerställer att både dina tekniska och personliga styrkor kommer till sin rätt. För dig som kandidat innebär det en möjlighet att visa din kompetens och potential från flera perspektiv.
   

  

 Har du frågor? Hör av dig till:
   

  

**Kalle Forsell** 
 , Talent Acquisition Partner: kalle.forsell@soprasteria.com
   

  

**Pu Fernqvist** 
 , Rekryterande chef: pu.fernqvist@soprasteria.com
   

  

**Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.**
**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Country Manager, Google Cloud
job_function: Sales, General Business, and Customer Service
company_industry: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**Minimum qualifications:**
* 15 years of experience in Software Sales.
* Experience in enterprise sales and general management in Cloud based technology.
* Experience with C-level customer relationships and connectivity in relevant markets.
* Experience with commercial deals and negotiations.
* Experience growing and leading teams and businesses within an organization.
* Ability to communicate in English and Swedish fluently in order to communicate in this customer-facing sales role.


**Preferred qualifications:**
* Experience leading in a hyperscale growth environment.
* Strong cross-functional leadership and collaboration skills, including experience with marketing or sales support in developing product, solution messaging, narratives and value propositions.
* Demonstrated understanding of enterprise software/infrastructure marketplace and key players as well as technical factors driving competitive landscape.


**About The Job**
 As the Country Manager of Google Cloud Sweden, you will be the advocate of Google Cloud and will drive how media, business, government and commercial customers in the region view Google Cloud. You will drive business growth and customer acquisition for Google Cloud. In addition, you will work cross-functionally to ensure alignment and an integrated Go-To-Market with other organizations, including Marketing and Operations.
   

  

 Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and execute the overall Google Cloud strategy for Sweden. As a member of the Nordic leadership team, contribute strategically to the growth and direction of Google Cloud products and services in the region.
* Deliver significant business and organizational growth for Google Cloud Sweden through the direct management of the Cloud Sales leadership team and the indirect management of the Cloud ecosystem in Sweden.
* Attract and develop a team, foster a high-performance culture, and lead people effectively through change.
* Grow large accounts and develop effective strategies for winning in a competitive environment. Manage a valuable external network of partners and customer executives.
* Develop role, industry and geographically appropriate business playbooks, tools, guides with messaging and positioning for different Google Cloud audiences.


 Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

title: Stockholms starkaste lösningsarkitekt ServiceNow
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
**Om Sopra Steria:**
 Sopra Steria är Europas ledande konsultföretag inom ServiceNow och digital transformation. Vi hjälper företag och organisationer att effektivisera sina verksamheter genom innovativa teknologilösningar. Med fler än 4000 ServiceNow-experter besitter vi marknadens största och mest framstående ServiceNow-team där får du möjligheten att arbeta med dem mest spännande projekten samt utvecklas i en dynamisk och framåtlutad arbetsmiljö. Nu tar vi nästa stora kliv och satsar ännu hårdare på vår ledande position inom ServiceNow. Hos oss får du chansen att vara med och driva utvecklingen framåt, forma framtidens lösningar och göra verklig skillnad. Vill du vara en del av vårt ledande team?
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 I rollen som lösningsarkitekt inom ServiceNow kommer du vara en central del i utvecklingen och designen av moderna lösningar för att effektivisera arbetsflöden och processer. Som Elite Partner för ServiceNow har vi en av Skandinaviens största och mest kvalificerade konsultgrupper med närmare 500 dedikerade experter. Vi söker nu en senior profil som kan ta en ledande roll i våra teamleveranser tillsammans med våra experter som utvecklar innovativa lösningar för våra kunder.
   

  

**Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter:**
* Designa och implementering avancerade lösningar inom ServiceNow.
* Ledande roll i att utveckla och konfigurera plattformen för att möta specifika krav och behov.
* Arbeta nära affärsavdelningar för att förstå och översätta deras verksamhetsbehov till tekniska lösningar.
* Driva tekniska workshops och rådgivning gentemot kunder.
* Aktiv deltagande i agila team och förmåga att leda och inspirera.


**För att vara framgångsrik i rollen tror vi att du har:**
* Flerårig erfarenhet som arkitekt inom ServiceNow med uppsättning, implementering, utveckling och konfiguration inom plattformen.
* Expertis inom Javascript, HTML, SQL och ITIL.
* Vana av att arbeta i agila team.
* Relevanta certifieringar inom ServiceNow.
* Eftergymnasial utbildning.
* Flytande i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.


**Vi erbjuder:**
* En spännande arbetsmiljö hos Europas ledande ServiceNow-konsultbolag.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med innovativa lösningar och den senaste tekniken.
* Kompetensutveckling genom certifieringar, utbildningar och mentorskap.
* Hybrid arbetsmodell samt konkurrenskraftiga villkor och förmåner


**Om ServiceNow-teamet på Sopra Steria:**
 Sopra Steria är Nordens ledande expert inom ServiceNow – vi har den största och mest specialiserade kompetensen på marknaden. Vårt starka och sammansvetsade team levererar omfattande och högkvalitativa lösningar, där flera av våra erfarna ServiceNow-konsulter samarbetar för att maximera värdet för våra kunder. Vi drivs av innovation, samarbete och kunskapsutbyte – tillsammans sätter vi nya standarder och skapar framtidens digitala lösningar. Vill du arbeta med de bästa? Då är Sopra Steria platsen för dig.
   

  

**Om Sopra Steria:**
 Sopra Steria är en av Europas ledande aktörer inom digital transformation, med över 60 000 medarbetare i mer än 30 länder globalt. Vi driver innovation och hjälper företag och organisationer att effektivisera, utvecklas och skapa långsiktigt värde genom banbrytande teknologilösningar.
   

  

 Hos oss arbetar de främsta experterna inom sina områden i en dynamisk och framtidsorienterad miljö där samarbete, nytänkande och teknisk spetskompetens står i centrum.
   

  

**Ansökan:**
 Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och vara en del av en framstående arbetsplats, ansök genom att ladda upp ditt CV. Kontakta gärna ansvarig rekryterare, Teodor Nellvik (teodor.nellvik@soprasteria.com) eller Business Owner Mikael Kroglund (mikael.kroglund@soprasteria.com) för eventuella frågor om tjänsten.
   

  

 På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

**Välkommen till Sopra Steria - där din kompetens formar framtidens digitala lösningar!**
**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Solutions Architect
description:
Solution Architect - iPaaS
 



 Define and drive iPaaS architecture – Establish the reference architecture, best practices, and architectural guidelines.
 



 Develop operational guidelines for iPaaS platform usage – Establish standardized ways of working with the iPaaS platform. Define and implement best practices for using iPaaS platform. Define processes around provisioning the platform.
 



 Lead architectural discussions – Guide engineers and architects in designing scalable and efficient iPaaS-based integration solutions.
 



 Act as an iPaaS ambassador – Enable business units to effectively leverage iPaaS by providing guidance and fostering adoption.
 



 EDI and File transfer capabilities in iPaaS – Drive EDI and file-based integration solutions using iPaaS.
 



 Identification of overlapping capabilities – Validate existing capabilities from other tools over the iPaaS capabilities and ensure duplicate tools do not exist for similar capabilities. Define long term strategic goals to achieve this.
 



 Collaborate with segment architects – Gather requirements, align with architectural directions, and communicate these effectively to the team.
 



 Support technical roadmap and planning – Assist the Digital Product Owner (DPO) in defining the technical roadmap and delivery plans, balancing short-term needs with long-term vision.
 



 Translate high-level requirements into actionable work items – Clearly define purpose, scope, and expected outcomes for development tasks.
 



 Ensure alignment with enterprise architecture principles – Secure adherence to the North Star architecture and ensure compliance with security directives and policies.
 



 Technical Skills:
 



 · Strong experience in integration implementation and architecture
 



 · Hands-on experience in implementing processes/workflows/recipes/integration flows from scratch using any industry leader iPaaS platform, with expertise in configuration of connectors for major CRM platform, spend management systems, REST enabled SaaS solutions, event platforms etc.
 



 · Sound knowledge on the data mapping, transformation, data enrichment needs and implementation of same in the appointed iPaaS platform.
 



 · Should have knowledge around at least one iPaaS specific scripting like Java scripting, Groovy, Python, Ruby etc.
 



 · Good understanding around how the iPaaS platform cost is driven, how to manage the performance of the platform etc.
 



 · Sound knowledge around security, isolations, compliance related topics in iPaaS platform.
 



 · Expertise in designing and implementing integration architectures.
 



 · High level understanding of API-led integration architecture.
 



 · Familiarity with Observability tools such as OpenTelemetry and Splunk.
 



 · Experience working in Agile environments, with a strong understanding of Agile methodologies. Knowledge of SAFe agile methodologies is advantageous.
 


* · Prior experience as part of a central integration team, enabling integration products and defining processes and methodologies for product adoption.

title: Senior Program Manager – Cyber Security
description:
Job Title: Senior Program Manager – Cyber Security
 



  Location: Stockholm, Sweden (Hybrid – 50% Remote)
 



  





 Assignment Brief
 



 We are looking for an experienced and strategic Cyber Security Program Manager to lead the development and optimization of a comprehensive portfolio of cybersecurity services. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in shaping and standardizing security capabilities, tools, and processes across the organization.
 



 You will work closely with stakeholders across the Cyber Security organization and business units to drive strategic initiatives, ensure alignment with business goals, and support transformation efforts to enhance overall security posture.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



 Lead and develop a portfolio of cybersecurity services with a focus on scalability and standardization.
 



 Identify gaps in current security services and frameworks; propose and drive improvements.
 



 Collaborate with stakeholders to align cybersecurity strategies with business priorities.
 



 Drive transformation and change initiatives, supporting process optimization and adoption.
 



 Monitor service delivery performance, leveraging data and KPIs to track progress and effectiveness.
 



 Ensure adherence to relevant cybersecurity frameworks and compliance standards.
 



  





 Required Skills & Qualifications
 


* 3+ years of experience in cybersecurity, ideally in program/project leadership roles.
* Solid understanding of security challenges in cloud or hybrid environments.
* Working knowledge of industry standards such as ISO/IEC 27001, NIST, or equivalent.
* Proven ability to lead or contribute to organizational change and transformation efforts.
* Strong stakeholder engagement, communication, and presentation skills.
* Data-driven mindset; ability to analyze and interpret metrics for informed decision-making.



  





 Preferred Education & Certifications
 


* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Cyber Security, Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Industry certifications such as CISSP, CISM, or equivalent.
* Project management credentials such as PMP, PRINCE2, or Agile/Lean certifications.

title: Engineering Manager
company_industry: Retail and Retail Apparel and Fashion
description:
**\*\* This is a 6-month contract position.** 




  





**Job Responsibilities** 




  





 As an Engineering Manager, you will have formal staff responsibility for 15-25 engineers (employees and consultants) working on various products focused on
 **SAP and SaaS products in the Enterprise Apps space** 
 . Your responsibilities will span from building a strong engineering culture to ensuring organizational health and efficiency in delivery and competence development.
 



  





 You will oversee recruiting, staffing, and talent retention, ensuring a balanced mix of consultants and employees across tech locations. Additionally, you will manage stakeholder expectations, address conflicting priorities, and translate long-term objectives into actionable strategies, maintaining a balance between tactical and strategic perspectives
 



  





**People Development** 



* Provide strategic direction and mentoring to Engineers, SAP and SaaS Application Experts
* Lead recruitment and onboarding efforts aligned with organizational objectives
* Organize training programs to ensure engineers possess the skills needed for success



  





**Budget Management** 



* Plan and manage the overall budget for the product area
* Ensure efficient allocation of resources across teams



  





**Cross-functional Coordination** 



* Collaborate with Product Managers and Engineering Managers to maintain cross-functional alignment
* Ensure team efforts align with business goals and strategic initiatives



  





**Staffing** 



* Manage team composition and workloads, addressing staffing needs holistically
* Maintain an optimal ratio of consultants and employees to balance expertise and cost
* Develop location strategies for onshore, nearshore, and offshore staffing models



  





**Required Skills and Experience** 




  




* 10-15 years of tech related experience, combining technical expertise with strong functional knowledge to deliver end-to-end solutions
* 3–5 years of managerial experience in similar roles
* Demonstrated expertise in the SAP areas and potentially SaaS applications, with experience leading teams in this domain
* Solid understanding and management of initiatives and teams in complex Product and Tech organization with focus on large scale and distributed systems and teams (Product and Value Stream focused teams, preferably some exposure to SAFe methodology)
* Proven ability to manage resource allocation budgets in large enterprises with complex backend systems
* Strong leadership and mentoring abilities to foster professional growth
* Capacity to balance stakeholder priorities and deliver practical solutions
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills to align cross-functional teams

title: Data Scientist - [F/M/X]
description:
Who are we?
   

  

**Amaris Consulting** 
 is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.
   

  

 At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:
   

  

**Brief Call** 
 : Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!
   

  

**Interviews** 
 (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
   

  

**Case study** 
 : Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.
   

  

 As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
   

  

 We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Job Description**
**Core Responsibilities**
* Design and deploy production-grade AI/ML solutions
* Perform data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation
* Collaborate with engineers, product teams, and domain experts
* Build scalable data pipelines on cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP)
* Fine-tune machine learning models (including LLMs and RAG)
* Communicate insights to technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Stay updated with cutting-edge AI/ML advancements


**Technical Skills**
**Programming & Analytics:**
* Python (Pandas, PyTorch, TensorFlow)
* Advanced SQL for big data
* Jupyter Notebooks, Git version control


**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
* AWS/Azure/GCP (AI services and data pipelines)
* Containers: Docker, Kubernetes
* ETL: Airflow, PySpark, Kafka


**AI/ML Expertise:**
* Supervised & Unsupervised Learning
* Deep Learning architectures
* LLMs (fine-tuning, embeddings)


**Qualifications**
* Degree in Data Science, AI, or related field
* 3+ years experience deploying ML models in production
* Experience with cloud-based AI solutions
* Fluent in English (Swedish preferred)


*Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.*

title: Senior Solution Architect
description:
**About Aras**
 Backed by top-tier investors, Aras is one of the fastest growing privately-held Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) companies. We reinvent, engineer, and manufacture software to empower our customers with the flexibility to overcome tomorrow's challenges today. We have experienced steady growth year after year and are looking to accelerate Aras to the next level. We seek for the best people committed to making this a true success story and share in that glory. With our technology, our community, and the way we do business, we are transforming the way the world makes products. Our open, low-code technology enables greater scalability, flexibility, and security for the world's largest enterprises. Airbus, General Electric (GE), Hitachi, Honda, Kawasaki, and Microsoft are just a few of the organization's using our software. Aras targets a variety of industries including automotive, aerospace and defense, high-tech electronics, medical devices, and industrial manufacturing.
   

  

 Are you an experienced Solution Architect who would enjoy leading the technical implementation team in the planning, elaboration, design, construction, and transition of PLM solutions that exceed customer requirements? Then you might be our new Solution Architect.
   

  

 As a Solution Architect at Aras, you have the overall ownership of the solution delivery. Demonstration of technical leadership, organization skills, and the ability to collaborate with key customer stakeholders and internal project managers are essential in ensuring success.
   

  

**Core Responsibilities**
* Lead a technical implementation team in all aspects of solution delivery
* Transform customer requirements into technical solutions by using thorough understanding of solution design and the Aras Innovator architecture and applications
* Facilitate workshops, develop solutions, build consensus across all stakeholders to ensure timely and successful delivery of technology aligned with business value
* Lead as well as support the development of requirements specifications, Use Cases, and functional specifications
* Perform solution analysis, develop customer facing proposals and contribute to the development of statements of work
* Facilitate and contribute to continuous improvement of how we deliver PLM solutions


**Your Profile Includes**
* Proven track record with enterprise software implementations in an Architect role, preferably within PLM
* Strong relationship building skills with both colleagues and external customers. Must be an effective communicator in difficult customer situations
* Highly organized and self-motivated with the ability to prioritize, meet deadlines, and manage changing priorities
* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Computer Science or Engineering (or equivalent experience)
* Experience in any of the following verticals: Automotive, Consumer Products, High Tech Electronics, Medical Devices, Aerospace, Defense, Shipbuilding
* Industry knowledge of any of the following: Engineering Design, Engineering Change Processes, Phase Gate Project Management, Quality Systems Processes, Manufacturing Process Planning, CMII Change Management, Systems Engineering, Requirements Engineering, Maintenance Design, Planning and Execution, Configuration Management, Variant Management
* Ability to contribute to creating clear and understandable Requirements, SoW’s, Specification Documents and Use Cases
* Fluent in English and Swedish for communication in an international environment


 Swedish citizenship is required – since security clearance in Sweden will be needed for some assignments
   

  

* Willingness to travel


**What We Offer**
* Dynamic, open-minded & international team
* Development opportunities in a high growth environment
* Work remotely or in one of our modern offices
* Flexible working time models
* Extensive Onboarding
* Great team spirit and warm, inclusive work environment.

title: Experienced data solution professional – in Stockholm or Gothenburg
description:
Do you want to be a part of shaping Valcon as a premium technology consulting firm in Sweden? Do you have 8 years of experience in consulting and/or other relevant roles? And are you passionate about creating lasting results for clients? Then you could be our new colleague.
   

  

 Valcon is a leading European management consulting firm with Scandinavian roots and an informal, inclusive culture. With offices in the Netherlands, Denmark, the UK, Sweden, Germany, Croatia and Serbia, we strive to connect strategy with operations through innovative technology and data. We are looking for an experienced and curious individual who values collaboration and thrives in dynamic, diverse environments.
   

  

**Experience**
* 8 years of experience in data consulting or other relevant roles
* Hands-on expertise
* Data Bricks, Microsoft Fabric
* A relevant Master degree


**Keywords**
* Creating lasting results
* Commercial mindset


**Location** 
 : Sweden
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 As a experienced data solution professional at Valcon, you will:
   

  

* Be part of the digital advisory team in one of the fastest-growing consultancies in Europe
* Contribute to our exciting growth journey while contributing to our expanding presence in the Swedish market
* Work side by side with skilled and experienced colleagues in diverse and international teams, tackling challenges from digital strategies to IT implementations
* Solve complex problems for Swedish and international companies across industries, guiding them to unlock the full potential of their data
* Help clients become more data-driven, comply with laws and regulations regarding their data and help them get the most value out of their data


**What We Are Looking For**
 To thrive in this role, you should be able to say yes to some or all of the following:
   

  

* 8 years of experience in data consulting or other relevant roles
* A relevant Master’s degree
* A strong understanding of industry standards, best practices and emerging trends in data, such as data governance, engineering, AI, and machine learning
* Hands-on expertise in designing scalable, secure and high-performing data/technical solutions aligned with client needs
* Proficiency in leading-edge tools and platforms such as Databricks, Celonis, Microsoft Fabric and the broader Azure ecosystem specialising in data and AI solutions
* Experience in data architecture, including data modelling and warehousing
* A commercial mindset with a proven track record in uncovering growth opportunities, building strong client relationships and selling complex technical assignments
* A thoughtful approach to leadership with the ability to guide and mentor project teams effectively
* Relevant certifications in IT management, project management (e.g., PMP) and digital transformation (e.g., CDT). ITIL, Microsoft and Cloud are a plus
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in both Swedish and English with the ability to translate technical concepts for a variety of stakeholders


**We offer you**
 At Valcon, we believe in fostering a diverse and inclusive environment where everyone feels valued and respected. We offer:
   

  

* A diverse and international workplace with an informal culture and a flat hierarchy
* The opportunity to collaborate across business areas and levels and work closely with some of the most talented and experienced consultants in the industry
* A focus on professional and personal growth, supported by our value-driven culture, which is grounded in Integrity, Together, Joy, Curious, and Can Do
* Enhanced benefits and support throughout all life stages, including maternity, paternity and adoption leave, health and well-being initiatives and resources for navigating significant life transitions
* A welcoming office environment in either Stockholm (Kungsgatan 9) or Gothenburg (Kungsportsavenyen 21)


 We care deeply about results, but we care even more about people. At Valcon, you’ll find a workplace that values excellence and ingenuity while keeping grounded in the reality of delivering lasting results for our clients.
   

  

**Application**
 Does this sound like the right opportunity for you? If so, we encourage you to apply below. For any questions or additional information, feel free to reach out to [email protected].
   

  

 We are reviewing applications and conducting interviews on an ongoing basis, so please send us your application as soon as possible.

title: Graduate Development Program
description:

 Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge-to-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. title: IT-Säkerhetsarkitekt till kund inom offentlig sektor.
description:
Position Description
   

  

 Är du en IT-säkerhetsarkitekt? Trivs du när du får jobba i en social roll med många kontaktytor? Har du arbetat som konsult eller i en linjebefattning och är ute efter nästa steg i din karriär?
   

  

**Då är det dig vi söker!**
 Just nu söker vi en IT-säkerhetsarkitekt till en av våra kunder inom offentlig sektor i Stockholm!
   

  

 Du kommer att vara en del av CGI Public där vi jobbar tätt tillsammans för många olika kunder. Vi söker dig som vill vara med och göra skillnad för våra kunder, där du får jobba med spännande uppdrag och vara med och på en strategisk och operativ nivå.
   

  

 Tillsammans med ett grupp fantastiska medarbetare och ledare kan vi erbjuda dig ett roligt och stimulerande arbete. Vi har en generös företagskultur och delar med oss av vår kunskap, vilket också är en förutsättning för att vi tillsammans ska lyckas med att utveckla vår verksamhet.
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
**Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.
   

  

 IT-Säkerhetsarkitekt till kund inom offentlig sektor.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Är du en IT-säkerhetsarkitekt? Trivs du när du får jobba i en social roll med många kontaktytor? Har du arbetat som konsult eller i en linjebefattning och är ute efter nästa steg i din karriär?
   

  

**Då är det dig vi söker!**
 Just nu söker vi en IT-säkerhetsarkitekt till en av våra kunder inom offentlig sektor i Stockholm!
   

  

 Du kommer att vara en del av CGI Public där vi jobbar tätt tillsammans för många olika kunder. Vi söker dig som vill vara med och göra skillnad för våra kunder, där du får jobba med spännande uppdrag och vara med och på en strategisk och operativ nivå.
   

  

 Tillsammans med ett grupp fantastiska medarbetare och ledare kan vi erbjuda dig ett roligt och stimulerande arbete. Vi har en generös företagskultur och delar med oss av vår kunskap, vilket också är en förutsättning för att vi tillsammans ska lyckas med att utveckla vår verksamhet.
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

 Som IT-säkerhetsarkitekt hos oss kommer du att vara en nyckelperson som bidrar till att driva och ta fram efterfrågat material för att därefter kunna ta viktiga beslut inom både arkitektur och IT-säkerhetsfrågor.
   

  

 Rollen kommer bland annat innefatta att ansvara för säkerhetsutredningar och göra analyser på befintlig it-arkitektur, applikationsnivå eller systemnivå. du kommer också att utföra regelbundna säkerhetsbedömningar, identifiera potentiella sårbarheter och risker i IT-infrastrukturen, samt förslag för att åtgärda dessa.
   

  

 Rollen innefattar även att leda workshops samt möta kunder för att ta fram olika förslag på lösning och tidsestimat utifrån kundens behov.
   

  

**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
 För att lyckas i rollen som söker vi dig som är problemlösare, ansvarstagande, flexibel och relationsskapande med ett brinnande intresse för IT-säkerhet och nätverk. Du trivs med att jobba både i grupp och självständigt.
   

  

* Vara väl insatt i tekniska standarder, protokoll, tekniker och produkter.
* Goda kunskaper inom design av IT-infrastruktur, nätverk, applikationsdrift och Operativsystem.
* Erfarenhet av Identitetshantering samt sårbarhetshantering.
* Stark social och kommunikationsförmåga med fokus på att skapa goda relationer.
* Stark analytisk förmåga för att enkelt sätta sig in i och förstå komplexa miljöer och kontexter. samt hur komponenter är relaterade till varandra.


 Det är även meriterande om du har erfarenhet av systemutveckling och/eller projektledning.
   

  

 Du kan flytande svenska, både i tal och skrift, då våra kunder primärt finns inom den publika sektorn samt behärskar engelska som är CGIs koncernspråk samt har en akademisk examen som högskoleingenjör eller motsvarande civil-/master examen inom exempelvis IT-säkerhet, data IT eller nätverk, alternativt relevant erfarenhet från liknande roll.
   

  

**På grund av tjänstens karaktär kräver att du har svenskt medborgarskap då du arbetar med säkerhetsklassificerad information och samhällskritiska system.**
**Ensemble, en tant que propriétaires, mettons notre savoir-faire à l’œuvre.**
 La vie chez CGI est ancrée dans l’actionnariat, le travail d’équipe, le respect et un sentiment d’appartenance. Chez nous, vous pourrez exploiter votre plein potentiel parce que…
   

  

 Nous vous invitons à devenir propriétaire dès le jour 1 alors que nous travaillons ensemble à faire de notre rêve une réalité. C’est pourquoi nous nous désignons comme associés de CGI, plutôt que comme employés. Nous tirons profit des retombées de notre succès collectif et contribuons activement à l’orientation et à la stratégie de notre entreprise.
   

  

 Votre travail crée de la valeur. Vous élaborerez des solutions novatrices et développerez des relations durables avec vos collègues et clients, tout en ayant accès à des capacités mondiales pour concrétiser vos idées, saisir de nouvelles opportunités, et bénéficier d’une expertise sectorielle et technologique de pointe.
   

  

 Vous ferez évoluer votre carrière en vous joignant à une entreprise bâtie pour croître et durer. Vous serez soutenus par des leaders qui ont votre santé et bien-être à cœur et qui vous permettront de saisir des occasions afin de parfaire vos compétences et élargir les horizons.
   

  

 Joignez-vous à nous, l’une des plus importantes entreprises de conseil en technologie de l’information (TI) et en management au monde.

title: Director, Digital Natives Sales, Google Cloud Nordics
job_function: Sales, General Business, and Customer Service
company_industry: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
Note: By applying to this position you will have an opportunity to share your preferred working location from the following:
 **Stockholm, Sweden; Copenhagen, Denmark; Helsinki, Finland; Oslo, Norway** 
 .
 **Minimum qualifications:**
* 15 years of experience in Software Sales.
* Experience of growing and leading teams and businesses within an organization.
* Experience with C-level customer relationships and connectivity in relevant markets. Experience with commercial deals and negotiations.


**Preferred qualifications:**
* Demonstrated ability to learn, understand and work with new emerging technologies, methodologies and solutions in the Cloud/IT Technology space.
* Ability to lead with enthusiasm and flexibility in a fast-paced, constantly evolving team environment.
* Demonstrated ability to engage and influence both technical and non-technical audiences - from developer to CEO to Board of Directors to Venture Capital and Private Equity owners.
* A strong, regional market reputation and actionable list of network contacts in the Digital Natives space.
* Expertise in the technologies driving next-generation companies: Generative AI, AI infrastructure, AI Agents, Web3, and modern cloud architectures (SaaS, PaaS, IaaS).


**About The Job**
 The Director, Digital Natives Sales will take ownership of the Digital Natives landscape in one of Google Cloud’s priority markets, the Nordics.
   

  

 As the Director, Digital Natives Sales for the Nordics, you won't just manage a sales team, you will advocate for Google Cloud's engagement with the region's most ambitious companies. You will be the trusted advisor to the founders, C-suites, and investors of AI-native startups, rapidly scaling tech firms, and future unicorns. Your mission is to understand their audacious goals and architect the Google Cloud solutions that will propel their growth.
   

  

 Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Manage an organization of Sales Managers to meet quarterly and annual bookings objectives for the region by focusing on enterprise companies.
* Deliver significant business and organizational growth for Google Cloud, including attracting and developing a team and fostering a high-performance culture. Manage a valuable external network of partners and customer executives.
* Design and execute innovative, scalable go-to-market strategies that cement Google Cloud as the preferred platform for AI-native companies and hyper-growth businesses.
* Collaborate with Google sales engineering and marketing resources, providing input on current collateral materials and ideas on how to improve them to maximize Google Cloud Platform in a given team. Achieve quarterly business growth goals.
* Develop effective strategies for winning in a competitive environment, deeply understanding complex customer requirements on both a business and technical level.


 Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

title: Konsult inom Informations-/datadriven vård
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 Vi söker konsulter med specialisering inom informations-/datadrivet beslutsfattande till vårt snabbt växande e-Hälsoteam. Du månar om vården och ser möjligheterna med digitalisering och särskilt informations-/ datadrivet beslutsfattande. Du kommer att arbeta inom någon eller flera aspekter som: ledning och styrning, verksamhetsutveckling, lösningsdesign och integration, datagovernance och juridik. Dina erfarenheter och drivkrafter: Du har tidigare arbetat med business intelligence och datadriven utveckling inom region och/eller kommun.
   

  

 Erfarenhet av AI-lösningar är meriterande.
   

  

 Du uppskattar att lära nytt, lösa problem och att dela dig med dig av den kunskap du har. Du är flexibel och ansvarstagande. Med flera års erfarenhet inom business intelligence och informationsdrivna arbetssätt inom region och kommun så har du den grund som behövs för att ta dig an arbetet i de uppdrag vi utför.
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Du kommer vara en del av ett multidisciplinärt specialistteam inom hälsa, vård och omsorg på ca. 40 medarbetare. Den övergripande uppgiften är att säkerställa att våra kunder kan realisera förväntade nyttor via strategi-, design- och förändringsarbete. Vi arbetar såväl enskilt som tillsammans med kollegor i våra projekt. Våra uppdrag genomförs med stöd av etablerade metoder och modeller som baseras på branschstandarder. Som konsult inom det nationella e-hälsoteamet, kommer du att ansvara för att CGIs leverans skapar mervärde för kunden, bibehålla goda kundrelationer samt bidra till ett gott samarbetsklimat internt och till vår gemensamma framgång. I den här rollen kommer du specifikt att bidra med förutsättningar för att informationsdrivet arbetssätt genomsyrar kundorganisationerna, och möjliggöra AI-tillämpningar.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Grundkrav Vi accepterar bara ansökningar på svenska. We only accept applications in Swedish. Erfarenhet av svensk sjukvård är ett absolut krav. A mandatory requirement is work experience from the Swedish healthcare system. God förståelse av nationell/regional vårdstruktur och etablerade standarder som HL7 och FHIR. Förstålse och intresse för att utveckla vården mha AI. Resor ingår i tjänsten / Travel is part of the job. Vi söker personer som kan axla följande uppgifter/områden
   

  

* Implementera informations-/datadrivet arbetssätt
* Leda utveckling
* Agera Kravställare
* Implementera och integrera BI-system
* Leda och utföra test och validering
* Data governance, exempelvis datakvalitet, masterdata
* Arbete som arkitekt inom integration och lösning


 Placeringsort:
   

  

 Göteborg, Stockholm eller Malmö
   

  

 Arbetsmiljö och sammanhang:
   

  

 Vi på CGI tror att vi når längre om vi trivs ihop och jobbar tillsammans. Varje dag stöttar vi varandra, våra kunder och bygger framtiden tillsammans. I det nationella e-hälsoteamet drivs vi av visionen att hjälpa offentlig och privat hälsa, vård och omsorg för att skapa bättre utfall för både individen och organisationen. Därutöver vill vi bidra till en positiv samhällsutveckling genom att vara en komplett partner så att Sverige på bästa sätt tillvaratar digitaliseringens möjligheter.
   

  

 Digitaliseringen inom vård, hälsa och omsorg ger enorma möjligheter men tekniken måste anpassas till de sammanhang där den ska göra nytta. Tillsammans med våra partners stöttar vi våra kunder med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och tjänster inom bland annat avancerad medicinsk bilddiagnostik, smarta sjukhus, datadriven sjukvård och AI.
   

  

 Övrigt om rollen
   

  

 Resor ingår i rollen, även om väldigt stor del av verksamheten numera sker digitalt. Bakgrundskontroller och registerkontroll kan komma att genomföras om uppdraget kräver det.
   

  

 Vad kan vi på CGI erbjuda dig?
   

  

 CGIs kombination av global och lokal närvaro, med kontor på 30 orter i Sverige, ger nöjda kunder men innebär även att du som anställd alltid har ett kontor nära dig. Detta i kombination med flexibla arbetstider ger dig möjlighet till balans mellan privatliv och arbete, oavsett var i livet just du befinner dig.
   

  

 På CGI finns även stora möjligheter till interna karriärvägar där du kan välja att bli specialist inom ditt område, bredda dig inom nya områden eller ta en ledande befattning. Via våra interna nätverk, projekt och åtaganden i globala och nationella industrier, erbjuder vi dig kompetensutveckling och engagerade ledare som stöttar just dig i din utveckling.
   

  

 Mer information om några av våra förmåner:
   

  

* Föräldralön: Vi betalar upp till cirka 90% av din lön under den första tiden hemma.
* Aktieprogram och delägarskap: Som delägare har du möjlighet att påverka och i vårt aktieprogram matchar CGI ditt bidrag, krona för krona upp till 3% av din månadslön.
* Friskvårdsbidrag: Vi erbjuder ett årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 4 000 kr.
* Trygg anställning: Våra medlemmar anställs med kollektivavtal och försäkringar.
* Pensionslösningar: Vi erbjuder attraktiva och förmånliga pensionslösningar.
* Personalbil: Personalbilen används som en privatbil men leasas av CGI.


 Vill du veta mer?
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig! Om du undrar över något, skicka gärna dina funderingar till Fredrik Augustsson. Fredrik.Augustsson@cgi.com
   

  

 Läs mer om CGI på vår hemsida: www.cgi.se
   

  

**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Tech lead/Solution Architect
description:
**A Few Words About Us** 




 First things first… What will you become a part of? Valtech, who recently acquired Kin + Carta, is the experience innovation company that exists to unlock a better way to experience the world. By blending crafts, categories, and cultures, our global team of more than 6,500 professionals in more than 60 offices help brands unlock value in a digitally accelerated world. At the intersection of insights and perspectives, we leverage the power of data, AI, creativity, and technology to achieve experience innovation for many of the world’s best-known organisations, including L’Oreal, NatWest, DWP, P&G, Volkswagen, and US department of Agriculture.
 



  





 Challenges where we re-imagine the customer journey and build new connected experiences. Challenges where we make data work in this new era and help our clients transform the way they operate and optimize business-critical digital platforms for multichannel commerce and marketing.
 



 From discovery to optimization, clients trust Valtech to remove complexity and deliver innovative, frictionless solutions that close the experience gap between customer expectation and reality. We are a network of more than 8,000 makers, thinkers, marketers, creatives, and developers spanning 5 continents with 60+ offices in 20+ countries.
 



  





**The Role** 




 Valtech is looking for a Tech Lead/Solution Architect with deep experience within platform implementation such as Optimizely. Are you passionate about creating and implementing innovative digital solutions? Are you enthusiastic about delving into the evolving trends and technologies? Are you based in Stockholm with ability to come to our office 2 to 3 times a week? Then you might be the person we are looking for! Keep reading to find out.
 



  





**Technology** 




 One of Valtech platforms partner is Optimizely. We have been partners since 2001 and is one of only a handful of Optimizely Global and Premium Solution Partners. You can read more about our partnership and explore some of our cases here.
 



  





**A day in the life of a Tech Lead/Solution Architect** 




 As an expert, you fulfil a unique and rewarding role as both a consultant/client advisor, and a technical leader. You will shape and participate in every stage of new and ongoing client engagements, from pre-sales, discovery to delivery, collaborating within both regional project teams and our global craft circle.
 



  





 You will also actively participate in the pre-sales process, contributing to pitches and client presentations. Leveraging your technical expertise, you'll effectively communicate how the platform solutions align with client needs and objectives, ensuring a seamless transition from initial discussions to project execution.
 



  





**More Specifically, You Will** 



* Engage with our clients' stakeholders from both IT and Business aligning our solutions to provide business value
* Define and implement scalable and resilient solutions for CMS projects, ensuring alignment with business objectives and industry best practices
* Collaborate with and lead cross-functional teams in designing and integrating complex backend systems, including CMS, with diverse external systems and services
* Champion architectural decisions and provide mentorship to development teams, fostering a culture of innovation, quality, and collaboration
* Proactively identify performance bottlenecks and technical challenges, developing strategies to optimize application responsiveness and efficiency
* Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in the digital landscape



  





**You and the role** 




 You are most likely someone with 10+ years of experience in backend development with a preferable focus on Optimizely CMS and it is a plus if you have experience from Commerce platforms too. You have experience handling extensive customer interaction, know how to communicate with clients, and how to identify additional ways your team can add value. You thrive in fast-paced, agile environment and are eager to contribute to a team that values innovation, creativity, and quality.
 



  





**We would love if you have** 



* Proven experience as a Backend Developer at a Lead or Architect level
* Strong knowledge of of .NET / .NET Core framework (C#), API driven development and Privacy by Design
* Extensive experience with CMS, preferable Optimizely, including content modelling, personalization, and e-commerce integration
* Proficiency in SQL, and experience with database design and development
* Experience with cloud (Azure) and DevOps practices
* Experience in developing and implementing optimization strategies for complex digital ecosystems
* Experience in leading architectural design for enterprise projects, proficiency in enterprise architecture frameworks, and preferably relevant certifications validating professional development.
* Fluent written and spoken communication skills in English and Swedish.



  





**What you can expect from us** 




 At Valtech you’ll become part of our exceptional team of more than 8,000 talented innovators, design thinkers, marketers, creatives, and engineers. We interact across countries, disciplines, trades, roles and teams. We are consultants before anything else and take ownership of our own work, clients, and careers.
 



  





 We provide everyone with a large degree of freedom - in return, we expect an equally high degree of accountability and dedication. We transform by doing and are insanely passionate about improving the end user experience. We are a people company.
 



  





 We share our knowledge and learnings; we dare to speak up and take risks. And we care deeply about one another, our clients, and the world around us. We have from our very beginning always worked hard on providing everyone within our organization the opportunity to grow and transform their job opportunities and career paths across the world.
 



  





 From graduates to seasoned professionals who are experts in their field. Valtech will always be recognized not just for the quality of the work we deliver, but for all the amazing people that make it happen. We don’t just talk about how to get things done; we really do transform by doing.
 



  





**Join Valtech** 




 Not only can you help us lead the experience revolution, but you can lead the change. The journey Valtech is on is ambitious and therefore opens doors. The more we grow – the more opportunities there are to take responsibility, implement your creative ideas, and be the innovator and driver to help move us, and our clients, forward.
 



  





**Does it excite you to join Valtech on this journey? And would you like to become our next Tech Lead/Solution Architect? Then apply today** 
 . We cannot wait to hear from you!

title: Finance Administrator
description:
**Xensam: SAM Disrupters** 




 Xensam is the leading provider of AI-powered, cloud-hosted Software Asset Management technology. We’re looking for key players to join us as we scale our impact and build the Xensam team together. We take our culture seriously and strive to maintain the excellence, energy & enthusiasm that flows through the organization today.
 



  





 We look for candidates who are passionate about what they do and ready to work the Xensam way. We know that experience counts, but we also know that it’s you, the person behind the experience, that makes it count.
 



  





**About the role** 




 Are you detail-oriented, driven, and experienced in both Accounts Receivable and Accounts Payable? Then this might be the perfect role for you! We are now looking for a Finance Administrator who will play a key role in managing and developing the AR and AP processes.
 



  





 You’ll support the CFO in various financial tasks, coordinate with external accounting firms in Sweden and the UK, and contribute to improving tools, routines, and quality within the finance function.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




 You will oversee the full Accounts Receivable process - from invoice issuance to payment collection. You will also participate in developing and improving AR processes and ensure the Accounts Payable process runs efficiently and accurately. Furthermore you will also:
 


* Act as the point of contact with external accounting firms (UK & Sweden) and ensure timely delivery of financial data.
* Provide internal support by answering finance-related questions and managing day-to-day admin tasks.
* Assist in compiling materials and data for the annual report and audits.
* Work closely with the CFO on financial planning, reporting, and process improvements.
* Actively contribute to enhancing routines, tools, and systems within the finance department.



  





**Qualifications** 



* A degree in finance, accounting, or a related field.
* Solid understanding and hands-on experience with both AR and AP processes.
* Strong coordination and communication skills.
* A proactive and structured way of working.
* Experience working with ERP systems and financial tools.
* Strong proficiency in written and spoken English and Swedish.



  





**What you get** 



* A dynamic position embracing "freedom under responsibility".
* Three days in-office (with remote work on Mondays and Fridays).
* A generous work culture with free access to drinks and snacks, office massages, and more.
* If sales targets are met, all employees enjoy an annual destination trip.
* Join an ambitious and diverse team, and work with cutting-edge technology in the fastest-growing SAM software on the market.
* An opportunity to shape your career growth while contributing to the company’s success.
* Other location-specific benefits.



  





**At Xensam, our core values define our culture** 




**Rebellious** 
 : We encourage a spirit of freedom and initiative within responsibility.
 



**Humane** 
 : We foster a caring, inclusive environment that values diversity and respects individuality.
 



**Harmonious** 
 : We promote work-life balance, creating a pleasant, supportive workplace.
 



 Join Xensam for a balanced, collaborative, and growth-focused work environment. If you're a team player ready to thrive,
 **APPLY now!** 




  





 As part of our recruitment process, we conduct background checks on final candidates to fulfill our commitments to customers and ensure a safe work environment.

title: Senior IT-säkerhetsspecialist – SOC Level 2
description:
Vill du arbeta i frontlinjen mot cyberhot och stärka säkerheten för oss själva och för våra kunder?
   

  

 Vi söker en erfaren och engagerad Senior IT-säkerhetsspecialist till vårt Security Operations Center (SOC).
   

  

 I denna roll får du möjlighet att analysera och hantera säkerhetshot, samtidigt som du utvecklar vår tjänst och vägleder både kunder och kollegor.
   

  

 Du kommer att vara en nyckelspelare i vårt team och arbeta med avancerade säkerhetsutredningar, incidentrespons och forensiska analyser – allt i en dynamisk och prestigelös miljö där vi ständigt strävar efter att höja kvaliteten på våra leveranser.
   

  

 Placeringsort: Stockholm, Malmö eller Göteborg
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

* Övervaka, analysera och hantera säkerhetshändelser i våra kunders mest kritiska IT-miljöer
* Agera vid säkerhetsincidenter och genomföra säkerhetsbedömningar för att minimera risker
* Bidra till att utveckla och förbättra SOC-tjänsten genom automation och processeffektivisering
* Stötta teamet i den dagliga verksamheten och höja kvaliteten på leveransen
* Delta i kunddialoger och presentationer samt ge rekommendationer för att stärka cybersäkerheten
* Vid behov delta och/eller leda i incidentrespons och forensiska utredningar


**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
 Vi söker en analytisk och lösningsorienterad specialist med stark förståelse för IT-säkerhet och nätverk. Du trivs i en roll där du får ta egna initiativ och bidra till utvecklingen av både tjänsten och teamet.
   

  

**Vi ser gärna att du har:**
* Relevant akademisk examen inom IT-säkerhet, nätverk, data eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en SOC-miljö, gärna på Level 2 eller högre
* Goda kunskaper inom IT-säkerhetsverktyg (SIEM, IDS/IPS, SOAR)
* Förmåga att leda projekt och vägleda och utveckla juniora analytiker
* Mycket goda kommunikationsfärdigheter i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


**Meriterande:**
* Certifieringar inom IT/Cybersäkerhet (t.ex. CompTIA Security+, CISSP)
* Erfarenhet av molnsäkerhet och drift i Azure, AWS eller Google Cloud
* Kunskap inom säkerhetsarkitektur och säkerhetsramverk
* Erfarenhet av automation & script inom säkerhetsområdet.


 Tjänsten kan vara placerad i säkerhetsklass, vilket innebär att en säkerhetsprövning kan behöva genomföras innan anställning.
   

  

**Vad vi erbjuder**
* En stimulerande och tekniskt avancerad arbetsmiljö där du får arbeta med den senaste säkerhetstekniken
* Möjlighet att påverka och utveckla vårt SOC och våra tjänster
* Stöd för vidareutbildning och certifieringar inom cybersäkerhet
* Ett sammansvetsat team med en kultur som präglas av kunskapsdelning, engagemang och innovation


 Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas så snart vi hittar rätt kandidat. Skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
   

  

 Har du frågor? Kontakta rekryterande chef Morgan Ivarsson (morgan.ivarsson@cgi.com) för dialog.
   

  

 Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.
   

  

**Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.

title: AI Engineer - [F/M/X]
description:
Who are we?
   

  

**Amaris Consulting** 
 is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.
   

  

 At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:
   

  

**Brief Call** 
 : Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!
   

  

**Interviews** 
 (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
   

  

**Case study** 
 : Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.
   

  

 As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
   

  

 We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Job Description**
**Core Responsibilities**
* Design and optimize AI systems (traditional ML + GenAI/LLMs) for production
* Build scalable AI infrastructure (GPU-optimized frameworks, MLOps pipelines)
* Implement LLM solutions (OpenAI, Claude, RAG, vector DBs) in real-world applications
* Collaborate with research/product teams to bridge innovation↔production gaps
* Maintain CI/CD/MLOps standards (testing, profiling, documentation)
* Track and apply cutting-edge AI advancements (e.g., transformer optimizations)


**Technical Requirements**
**Must-Have:**
* Python/C++ (production-grade) | PyTorch/TensorFlow
* GPU/HPC: CUDA/HIP, Spark, or distributed computing
* Cloud AI: Azure/AWS/GCP deployment experience
* LLM Stack: API integration, RAG, vector databases (e.g., Pinecone)
* MLOps: Git, CI/CD, model monitoring


**Nice-to-Have:**
* Infrastructure as Code (Terraform)
* Microservices & REST APIs
* Visualization (Power BI)
* Research-to-production transition experience


**Profile**
**Education:**
* PhD/MSc in CS, AI, or related field


**Experience:**
* 3–8+ years in AI engineering (or strong PhD research in transformers)


**Soft Skills:**
* Fluent English | Collaborative | Pragmatic innovator


*Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.*

title: Cyber Security Engineer
description:
**Expleo** 
 is seeking a highly skilled and experienced
 **Senior DevSecOps Consultant** 
 to join our team in
 **Sweden** 
 (located in Gothenburg OR Stockholm).
   

  

 Our
 **ideal** 
 candidate has strong problem-solving skills, an analytical mindset and the ability to lead the integration of security into the development and operations processes.
   

  

 If you are a full-stack engineer looking to expand your skill set, we'd love to hear from you. Join our team today and take the next step in your career!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* DevSecOps Strategy Implementation {​{:}} Support and implement a comprehensive DevSecOps strategy that aligns with organizational objectives and security standards.
* CI/CD Pipeline Security Integration {​{:}} Integrate security tools and practices within CI/CD pipelines to automate security checks and ensure continuous security compliance

* s. Infrastructure as Code (IaC) Security{​{:}} Ensure security best practices are embedded in IaC scripts and configuratio
* ns. Container and Microservices Security {​{:}} Implement security measures for containerized applications and microservices architectu
